类 cn.jmessage.api.common.BaseClient
的使用

  • 使用BaseClient的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    cn.jmessage.api.chatroom
    Chat room API features. https://docs.jiguang.cn/jmessage/server/rest_api_im/#_56
    cn.jmessage.api.crossapp
    Cross App API features.
    cn.jmessage.api.group
    Group management API features.
    cn.jmessage.api.message
    Message management API features.
    cn.jmessage.api.reportv2
    Rest Report V2 相关接口, 文档链接： https://docs.jiguang.cn/jmessage/server/rest_api_im_report_v2/
    cn.jmessage.api.resource
    User management API features.
    cn.jmessage.api.sensitiveword
    Sensitive word management API features.
    cn.jmessage.api.user
    User management API features.
